subtitles.text: Well, this time we came to Kagoshima Prefecture

Our area here in Chunan High School is now a residential area,
The rice fields have been cultivated here for more than 30 years,
Local people come here to teach us how to grow rice.
The local people come here to teach us how to grow rice,
We hope that through growing rice with the children, they will learn about the difficulties of rice farming and the joys of making rice,
We want them to have an interest in agriculture and to eat rice with gratitude,
I am now able to raise children who are interested in agriculture and who are grateful for the rice they eat,
